hr.fer.zemris.ml.training.decision_tree.split

Interface ISplitCriterion<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the target value, usually String for classification and Double for function approximation tasks.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractClassificationSplitCriterion, AbstractSplitCriterion, EntropyReduction, GiniIndexReduction, SDReduction

    public interface ISplitCriterion<T>
    Interface for evaluating the best split at the current node during decision tree training.
    Author:
    Dan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.function.Predicate<double[]> getBestSplit(java.util.List<Sample<T>> samples, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> featureIndices)
      Returns the best split of given samples considering only features whose indices are also given.

    • Method Detail

      • getBestSplit

        java.util.function.Predicate<double[]> getBestSplit(java.util.List<Sample<T>> samples,
                                                    java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> featureIndices)
        Returns the best split of given samples considering only features whose indices are also given.
        Parameters:
        samples - samples to split into 2 sets
        featureIndices - indices of features to consider for a split
        Returns:
        Predicate which splits given samples into 2 sets based on the evaluation of the best split
